EDUSA College

EDUSA College is a private tertiary education institution based in Johannesburg, South Africa. The college offers a range of career-focused courses and programs, including business studies, tourism and hospitality, marketing, and information technology.

Here are some key facts about EDUSA College:

  • The college was founded in 1999 and has been providing quality education and training to students for over 20 years.
  • EDUSA College is registered with the Department of Higher Education and Training (DHET) and is accredited by various industry bodies.
  • The college offers both full-time and part-time courses to accommodate the needs of students.
  • EDUSA College has a team of experienced lecturers and instructors who are industry experts in their respective fields.
  • The college has modern facilities, including computer labs, a library, and a student lounge.
  • EDUSA College provides students with practical training and work-integrated learning opportunities to gain hands-on experience in their chosen field.
  • The college offers various support services to students, including career guidance and counseling.

What to Know About the EDUSA College Application Form Portal

The EDUSA College EDUSA College Application portal is designed to accept applications of candidates seeking admission into the University. In the portal, applicants can Purchase application forms, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slips, check the admission list, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission to the EDUSA College application portal, candidates must;

  • Have a Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to EDUSA College on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

EDUSA College Application Requirements

The application requirements for EDUSA College may vary depending on the specific course or program you are applying for. However, here are some general requirements that may apply:
  1. You must be at least 18 years of age or have completed Grade 12 (or equivalent).
  2. You must provide a certified copy of your ID or passport.
  3. You must provide a certified copy of your Grade 12 certificate or equivalent qualification.
  4. Some courses or programs may have specific subject requirements, such as mathematics or English.
  5. Some courses or programs may require you to have completed a certain level of education or work experience.
  6. For international students, you may be required to provide proof of English proficiency, such as a TOEFL or IELTS score.

How to Apply | EDUSA College Application Form 2024

To apply to EDUSA College, you can visit their website at https://www.edusa.co.za/ and follow these steps:

  1. Click on the “Apply Now” button on the homepage or navigate to the “Admissions” section.
  2. Create an account on the online application portal by providing your personal information, such as your name, ID number, and email address.
  3. Log in to your account and select the course or program you wish to apply for.
  4. Complete the online application form by providing your personal details, academic qualifications, and any other required information.
  5. Upload your supporting documents, such as your ID or passport, Grade 12 certificate, and any other required documents.
  6. Pay the application fee, if required, through the online portal.
  7. Submit your completed application.

After submitting your application, the college will review it and contact you with further information on the admission process. If you have any questions or need assistance with the application process, you can contact the college’s admission office for assistance.

 

EDUSA College Application Required Documents

To apply to EDUSA College you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript
